name: Everyday (Tambosi)
description:
Welcome to Everyday:

You have 3 ways to spend your day: going to work (clicking on the door, gives you money), playing or watching something on the television (clicking on the TV, gives you Joy) and reading something (clicking on the book, gives you Emotions). Each activity is going to raise one of yours status and lower the other two. Yet, everyday you will have different events, possibly affecting your status in a good or in a bad way.  Your luck is determined by your stats: Emotions affect Work, Work affect Joy and Joy affect Emotions, so try to no lose control of any stat. You have a limited amount of time/actions.Try to survive as long as possible.

Enjoy :)
